annotations.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.html_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.rst_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.name: file_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.name: file_unique_id

annotations.description: Type of the sticker, currently one of 'regular', 'mask', 'custom_emoji'. The type of the sticker is independent from its format, which is determined by the fields is_animated and is_video.
annotations.html_description: Type of the sticker, currently one of “regular”, “mask”, “custom_emoji”. The type of the sticker is independent from its format, which is determined by the fields is_animated and is_video.
annotations.rst_description: Type of the sticker, currently one of 'regular', 'mask', 'custom_emoji'. The type of the sticker is independent from its format, which is determined by the fields *is_animated* and *is_video*.
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: True, if the sticker is animated
annotations.name: is_animated

annotations.description: True, if the sticker is a video sticker
annotations.html_description: True, if the sticker is a video sticker
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the sticker is a `video sticker <https://telegram.org/blog/video-stickers-better-reactions>`_
annotations.name: is_video

annotations.description: Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format
annotations.name: thumbnail

annotations.description: Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs
annotations.html_description: Optional. Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs
annotations.name: set_name

annotations.description: For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker
annotations.html_description: Optional. For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker
annotations.name: premium_animation

annotations.description: For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed
annotations.html_description: Optional. For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed
annotations.name: mask_position

annotations.description: For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji
annotations.html_description: Optional. For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji
annotations.name: custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places
annotations.name: needs_repainting
